Perk.name: Armorer
Perk.description: Reduces the battlegroup's taken damage by 10%

Perk.name: Marksmanship
Perk.description: Increases the battlegroup's damage output by 10%

Perk.name: Diplomacy
Perk.description: Increases change of success during negotiations by 10%

Perk.name: Haggler
Perk.description: Reduces cost of purchased items and units by 10%. Affects recruitment costs as well.

Perk.name: First Aid
Perk.description: Increases effectiveness of healing and repair abilities by 10%

Perk.name: Leadership
Perk.description: Boosts morale of the battlegroup by 10%

Perk.name: Scavenger
Perk.description: Increases resource gains when picking up items or winning battles by 10%
